The '''nerd creeper''' is a hostile [[creeper]]-based [[mob]] present in the April Fool's [[Java Edition 3D Shareware v1.34]] update.

== Spawning ==
Nerd creepers spawn when the player uses the cheat code "NEEEERD".

Creepers in this version have an NBT tag called {{nbt|bool|d20}} (1 = true/0 = false) that determines whether the creeper is a nerd.

A nerd creeper can be summoned with the following command: <code>/summon creeper ~ ~ ~ {d20:1}</code>

== Drops ==
When killed, nerd creepers drop: 

* {{Xp|5}} [[experience]] points, if killed by the [[player]] or a tamed [[wolf]].
*1 {{ItemLink|3D}} item.
*1 {{ItemLink|music disc}} at random, if killed by a [[skeleton]] or [[stray]].
*1 {{BlockLink|link=head|creeper head}}, if killed by a [[#Charged Creeper|charged creeper]].

== Behavior ==
Nerd creepers behave the same way as [[creeper]]s except when killed, upon which they drop the [[3D]] item in addition to [[gunpowder]].
